articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Harris says will end Gaza war in final election appeal to Arab Americans - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Harris risks losing support of Michigan’s 200,000-strong Arab Americans, who denounce the US handling of Israel’s war.
articles.content:
In her closing pitch for the presidency of the United States, Democrat aspirant Kamala Harris has promised to end the war in Gaza.
Campaigning in the swing state of Michigan, home to many Arab Ameri… [+2849 chars]
